original_text: And Aaron shall bring the bullock of the sin offering, which is for himself, and shall make an atonement for himself, and for his house, and shall kill the bullock of the sin offering which is for himself:
korean_text: 아론은 자기를 위한 속죄제의 수송아지를 드리되 자기와 집안을 위하여 속죄하고 자기를 위한 그 속죄제 수송아지를 잡고

sentences.original_text: And Aaron shall bring the bullock of the sin offering
sentences.korean_translation: 아론은 속죄 제물의 수소를 가져와야 하며

sentences.original_text: and shall make an atonement for himself
and shall kill the bullock of the sin offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 속죄 제물의 수소를 잡아야 하며
